Comments_List:
I gained new insights into the variety of tools and weapon systems the US Navy has under its control, and how my role as a JO will impact the readiness of sailors/systems under me.

Learned about cool stuff like EM jamming devices, the physical underpinnings, etc.

Strengths:  Semi-interesting material (except for the cyber domain stuff), engaging and humorous lecturer, low workload compared to other classes.

Weaknesses:  Required as a NROTC midshipman, early class hours (7:25 ish start), powerpoint slide presentation is bland/unwieldy.

Take this class if interested in learning about missiles, rockets, how electronic jamming works, etc, in a casual, laid-back environment.

Don't take if mornings are not your thing.  Waking up to walk in the cold and darkness early in the semester is not fun.
